name: Nordic Hunters' Alliance
legal: ngo, formally registered with the Danish authorities
goal: To develop and promote the Nordic model for sustainable hunting and wildlife management, including providing information to the authorities and the public nationally and internationally.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Sport, Trade
euInitiatives: Birds/Habitats/Firearms Directive, Biodiversity strategy, Natura 2000, Invasive Species, Animal welfare
